name: Daemon Magic
summary: The magic of Abaddon runs through your blood, and you can wield that power.
description:
The magic of Abaddon runs through your blood, and you can wield that power. You can cast death knell and false life each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.Traits

Tiefling: A creature with this trait has the tiefling versatile heritage. Tieflings are planar scions descended from fiends. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by tieflings.
